          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A Föld kőzetlemezei és a lemezmozgások okai</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Plates Of Earth And The Reasons Of Plate Movements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Platten Von Masse Und Die Gründe Der Platte 
Bewegungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Plats de la Terre et Les Raisons des 
Mouvements de Plat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As Placas Da Terra E As Razões De Movimentos Da 
Placa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le Piastre Di Terra Ed I Motivi Dei Movimenti 
Della Piastra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα πιάτα της γης και οι λόγοι των Κινημάτων πιάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las Placas De la Tierra Y Las Razones De los 
Movimientos De la Placa</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Kőzetlemezek határai, mozgásai, magma, láva keletkezése, riftesedés, ócáni hátság kialalkulása.</string>
            <string language="en-US">Boundaries and Movements of Plates, Generation of Magma and Lava, Rifting, Formation of Oceanic Rifts</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">földrajz</string>
            <string language="en-US">geography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">kőzetlemez</string>
            <string language="en-US">litospheric plate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">hasadékvölgy</string>
            <string language="en-US">rift valley</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">óceáni hátság</string>
            <string language="en-US">oceanic ridge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">lemezszegély</string>
            <string language="en-US">plate edge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grenzen und Bewegungen der Platten, des Erzeugung
des Magmas und der Lava, Rifting, Anordnung der ozeanischen Risse</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bornes et mouvements des plats, de la 
génération du magma et de la lave, Rifting, formation des crevasses 
océaniques</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Limites e movimentos das placas, da geração do 
magma e da lava, Rifting, formação de rifts oceanic</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Contorni e movimenti delle piastre, della 
generazione di magma e della lava, Rifting, formazione delle 
Spaccature oceaniche</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όρια και μετακινήσεις των πιάτων, παραγωγή του 
μάγματος και λάβα, Rifting, σχηματισμός των ωκεάνειων ρωγμών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Límites y movimientos de placas, de la 
generación del magma y de la lava, Rifting, formación de grietas 
oceánicas</string>
          </description>
